statements: SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data;
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%capsule%' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM biopharmaceutical_sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, manufacturer FROM ProductDetails;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ProductDetails WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, expiration_date FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, sale_amount FROM ProductDetails JOIN SalesData ON ProductDetails.product_id = SalesData.product_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, product_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductDetails WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' AND expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT product_id, MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id HAVING max_sale_amount > 5000 ORDER BY max_sale_amount DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM ProductDetails GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_products DESC;

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, s.quantity_sold, s.sale_amount FROM ProductDetails p INNER JOIN SalesData s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY s.quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT trend, forecast, date FROM market_analysis WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, category, manufacturer FROM product_details WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT analysis_id, trend FROM market_analysis WHERE forecast < 100 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, manufacturer FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' AND category = 'Electronics'
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_amount FROM product_details p INNER JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT rep_name, territory FROM sales_representatives;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, quantity, total_amount FROM sales_transactions;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM market_trends;
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT rep_name, territory FROM sales_representatives WHERE territory IN ('East Coast', 'West Coast');

SELECT product_name, transaction_date, total_amount FROM biopharmaceutical_products JOIN sales_transactions ON biopharmaceutical_products.product_id = sales_transactions.product_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM sales_representatives;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC

SELECT pd.product_name, pd.unit_price, si.quantity FROM product_inventory si JOIN sales_data sd ON si.product_id = sd.id JOIN market_trends mt ON sd.sale_date = mt.trend_date WHERE mt.trend_description LIKE '%positive%'

SELECT sr.rep_name, COUNT(sf.feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM sales_representatives sr LEFT JOIN customer_feedback sf ON sr.rep_id = sf.customer_id GROUP BY sr.rep_name ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sd.product_name, si.quantity, si.unit_price FROM sales_data sd INNER JOIN product_inventory si ON sd.id = si.product_id WHERE si.quantity > 0 AND si.unit_price < 50 LIMIT 5
